content.description: Sit start on the far right-hand side of the Dev il's Horsepen cliff under a small overhang on a compression feature. Utilize a toe hook or heel hook to go up right hand to a crimp right below the roof. From there, go left into a two-finger pocket under cling. This is the crux, get good feet, and, using the two-finger undercling reach out over the lip to a crimp on the right-hand side. Cut loose and match. Campus up to a better edge and top it out by walking right.
content.location: Sit starts on the far right-hand side of the main Devil's Horsepen cliff.

content.description: These are mainly drop-off problems on the big Devil's Horsepen cliff. There are a couple of good, hard problems here.
